name: Gauss Tape Echo
details:
Super-Saturated Tape EchoI don't have much experience of tape delays but I like this quite a bit. The only downside is that it does have a small volume drop when engaged. It's not a problem if you use a preamp pedal though to boost the volume a little. Also the "Mod" switch is not for modulation, it acts like an Echoplex preamp or thereabouts.
Responsive pedal faithfully reproduces every saturated nuance of a tape echo machine
3-knob interface allows intuitive control of delay time, sustain and volume
Mod switch lets you convert your signal to warm tape echo sounds
True bypass for ultimate signal integrity
"Built-like-a-tank" metal chassis
Runs on 9 V battery or PSU-SB DC power supply (not included)
3-Year Warranty Program*
Designed and engineered in Denmark
